name: Designer toolkit
description:
As designers, it's important to have a toolbox we can refer to when working through projects in cross functional teams. Use this toolkit for ideas on how to get the most out of your share outs and project deliverables, or use as a presentation or documentation template for your work.




Who's this for?

Professionals or students



What's included?

• Design presentation template for share outs and design reviews

• Design handoff template for sharing designs between teams

• File organizer and planner for your Figma projects

• Sticker sheet, cause why not
